MOSQITO
  • mosqito.utils
  • <no title>
  • View page source
isoclose(actual, desired, rtol=1e-07, atol=0, is_plot=False, tol_label=None, xaxis=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Check if two arrays are equal up to desired tolerance.

The test is inspired from section 5.1 of ISO 532-1. It compares actual to desired +/- min(atol, rtol * abs(desired)).

Parameters:

  • actual (array_like) ‚Äì Array obtained.

  • desired (array_like) ‚Äì Array desired.

  • rtol (float, optional) ‚Äì Relative tolerance. Default to 1e-7

  • atol (float, optional) ‚Äì Absolute tolerance. Default to 0

  • is_plot (bool, optional) ‚Äì To generate a ‚Äúcompliance‚Äù plot. Default to False

  • tol_label (str) ‚Äì Label for the tolerance curves Default to None

  • xaxis (array_like, optional) ‚Äì x axis for the ‚Äúcompliance‚Äù plot. Default to None

Returns:

is_isoclose ‚Äì False if actual and desired are not equal up to specified tolerance.

Return type:

bool
